title: Analyst Upgrades: 3 Stocks That the Pros Can't Stop Raving About
text: Sell-side analysts have ratings on specific stocks, and based on them, they recommend to clients whether they should buy, sell or stay away from them. Analyst upgrades and downgrades can significantly influence the stock market, affecting both stocks with analyst upgrades, individual stock prices and broader market sentiment.

title: Will Apple Beat on Q2 Earnings Amid iPhone Slump? ETFs in Focus
text: The tech giant has a reasonable chance to beat earnings estimates. It saw positive earnings estimate revision activity, which is generally a precursor to an earnings beat.

title: Will Solid Mac Sales & Services Aid Apple's (AAPL) Q2 Earnings?

title: What You Need To Know Ahead of Apple's Earnings Report
text: Apple (AAPL) is set to report second-quarter earnings after the bell on Thursday, with investors likely to be watching for iPhone sales numbers and potential updates related to artificial intelligence (AI).

title: Analyst revise Apple stock price targets amidst earnings
text: Though known for over a decade as the stock every investor should own, Apple (NASDAQ: AAPL) has been on a substantial downtrend with neither of its two rallies – as Jim Cramer himself predicted in the latter case – managing to hold.

title: Option Trade On Struggling Apple Stock Could Return $365

title: 3 Spatial Computing Stocks That Will Dominate the Future of Work
text: It's not all fun and games when it comes to the market's top spatial computing (or metaverse) stocks. Undoubtedly, we've seen some pretty capable mixed-reality headsets launching in recent years.

title: Apple earnings: tech giant faces likely 10% fall in iPhone sales, questions on AI push
text: On Thursday, Apple Inc. (AAPL.O) is set to disclose its quarterly earnings, which analysts predict will show the largest revenue decline for the company in over a year. The focus will likely be on Apple's initiatives to integrate generative AI into its iPhones and its strategy to recover declining sales in the vital Chinese market.

title: Apple set for big sales decline as investors await AI in iPhones
text: Apple's plan to add generative AI to its iPhones and revive sagging sales in the crucial Chinese market will be in focus on Thursday, when the tech giant is expected to report its biggest quarterly revenue decline in more than a year.

title: Is Apple Stock Going to $195? 1 Wall Street Analyst Thinks So.
text: The replacement cycle with the iPhone 16 could recharge demand. Apple has also led the way for big tech stocks to pay investors a dividend.
